name: Dream Walkthrough
description:
Made in 6 days for the Sleepy Bitsy Jam. I was somewhat inspired by LSD Dream Emulator for the Playstation, I wanted to recreate some of my recurring dreams, but in the end I've managed to include only two: driving in the rain while listening to the radio and watching weird late night tv shows (while it's raining too!).

Both scenarios are essentialy huge text dumps of radio show transcripts, lectures and
some instruction manuals I grabbed from archive.org. Ideally they should be boring enough to make you fall asleep!

Maybe I'll add some new dreams in the future. Sorry if there are still some small graphical glitches I couldn't figure out! 

Music will be available for download on https://wanderingartist.bandcamp.com/ soon!

Made with Bitsy3d and the Bitsy Muse hack by https://github.com/seleb
